content: व्यथ् {c1c} <ab>A.</ab> (व्यथते, व्यथित) {@--1@} To be sorry, to be pained, vexed or afflicted, be agitated or disquieted; विश्वंभरापि नाम व्यथते इति जितमपत्यस्नेहेन <ls>U. 7</ls>; न विव्यथे तस्य मनः <ls>Ki. 1. 2</ls>, <ls n="Ki. 1.">24.</ls> {@--2@} To be disturbed, be ruffled or agitated; व्यथितसिंधुमनीरशनैः शनैः <ls>Ki. 5. 11.</ls> {@--3@} To tremble. {@--4@} To be afraid. {@--5@} To dry, become dry. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} (व्यथयति-ते) {@--1@} To pain, distress, vex, annoy; <ls>U. 1. 28.</ls> {@--2@} To frustrate, mar. {@--3@} To frighten, terrify. {@--4@} To lead or turn away. --WITH प्र to be excessively vexed; <ls>Bg. 11. 20.</ls>
